title="New Popup" width="90%"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2yhh-1726" allowhtml="true"><contents><b>Please use a rough guide for rating payouts.</b><br>
<br><em><strong>This is for internal use only.</em></strong><br>
<br><b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b><br>
1. Basic errors on documents, 3 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 2-3 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 2-3 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items but communication could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, deposit paid and al documents/ invoices correct.<br>


<br><b>Sale & HP Back / Vendor sale</b><br>

1. Basic errors on documents, 5 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 3-4 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 3-4 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, and all documents/ invoices correct and conditions met.<br></contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></field></fields></section></sections></column><column width="50%" uniqueid="sk-2ygo-1534"><sections><section title="Payouts }</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="customDelete" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
$("#data tr").click(function() {
    $(this).toggleClass("highlight");
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refreshApppage" cachelocation="false">window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UWMetRender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if (value == 'Satisfied') 
{ 
    field.item.element.addClass("approved");
    
}
else if (value == 'Not Satisfied')
{
    field.item.element.addClass("not-approved"); 
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ChecklistStatusRender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if ( value == 'In Progress' || value == 'Deferred') 
{ 
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("yellow");
    
}
else if (value == 'Not Applicable')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("red"); 
}
else if (value == 'Completed')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("green");
    
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="approvalrowrender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if ( value == 'Rejected') 
{      
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("red");
    
}
else if (value == 'Approved')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("green"); 
    
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem></javascript><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-1Ou3-976"/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="color"><styles><styleitem property="background-color" value="white"/></styles></styleitem></styles><interactions/></skuidpage>

4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. uniqueid="sk-3EZk-1840" allowhtml="true"><contents><b>Please use a rough guide for rating payouts.</b><br>
<br><em><strong>This is for internal use only.</em></strong><br>
<br><b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b><br>
1. Basic errors on documents, 3 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 2-3 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 2-3 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items but communication could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, deposit paid and al documents/ invoices correct.<br>


<br><b>Sale & HP Back / Vendor sale</b><br>

1. Basic errors on documents, 5 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 3-4 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 3-4 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout! – Clear communication, and all documents/ invoices correct and conditions met.<br></contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></field></fields><renderconditions 	var $ = skuid.$;
	$('head').append(
        $('<base target="_blank">')
    );
	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        $(document).on('click','.fa-times-circle',function()
        {
            var trElem = $(this).parents('tr');
            if(trElem.hasClass('highlight')){
                trElem.removeClass('highlight');
            }
            else{
                trElem.addClass('highlight');
            }
        })
        
         var modelDoc = skuid.model.getModel('DocusignTemplate');
        var ret = sforce.apex.execute("Docusigntemplates","getdata",{});
        modelDoc.updateData(); 
        
        var model_one = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
		
		//alert(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c);
		
		if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != null)
		{
        	var model_two = skuid.model.getModel('contract1');
            model_two.setCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_two.activateCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"));
            model_two.updateData(); 
		}
        
        //quote // TerminationQuote
        if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != null)
		{
            var model_three = skuid.model.getModel('TerminationQuote');
            model_three.setCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c.split(";"));
            model_three.activateCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"));
            model_three.updateData(); 
            
            /*var atmt = model_three.data;
            var i=0;
            alert(atmt.length);
            for(i=0; i<atmt.length;i++)
            {
                alert(model_three.data[i].id+' - Contract: '+ model_three.data[i].cllease__Contract__r.Name);
            }*/
            var model_four = skuid.model.getModel('ContraAttachment');
            model_four.setCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_four.activateCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"));
            model_four.updateData(); 
		}
	});
})(skuid);

var appRow = appModel.data[0];

//alert(appRow.Id);
//alert(appRow.Name); 


try {
   if(!appRow.Is_Contract_created__c){
        var ret = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.ConvertApplicationCtrl','convertApplicationToContract',
       {   
           appId : appRow.Id
       });
       
       var message = ret.toString();
       if(message == 'Application is converted to contract successfully') {
            appModel.updateRow(appRow,{'Is_Contract_created__c':true,'genesis__Status__c':'TRANSFERED'});
            var ret = sforce.apex.execute("SAF_ValidateApplication","onConvert",{AppId:appRow.Id});
            //var ret1 = sforce.apex.execute("DeleteProposalFeeOnLease","deleteRecords",{AppId:appRow.Id});
            appModel.save();
            alert(message);
       }
       else if (message.includes("Payment Schedule must start from First Payment Date on Contract"))
       {alert('Please update payment dates by running the XIRR Payment Wizard before converting');}
        else if (message.includes("is not part of the contract's fee set"))
        {alert('Please check the Fees that have been allocated to the Contract to make sure they are all eligable for this application');}
        else if (message.includes("Either Account or Contact is not selected"))
        {alert('Please check the associated parties to ensure there is not a party without an account associated');}           
        else if (message.includes("cllease__Pay_To__c"))
        {alert('Please check the parties associated to the Expense fees to ensure the associated Account is not a Lessee party');} 
        else if (message.includes("Payment Frequency cannot be blank"))
        {alert('Please ensure the Payment frequency on the Proposal is not blank and the Expected Start date is populated');}
        else if (message.includes("Expense fee should always start from Contract Date"))
        {alert('Please update the Expene Fee Dates to the Start Date');}        
        
       else{
           alert('Else ' + message);
       }
   }
   else {
       alert('This application is already converted');
   }
   console.log('Jake said put this here');
}
   catch(error) {
       console.error(error);
   alert('Catch errror: ' + error);
}
window.location.reload();

            termQuoteResult = sforce.connection.query("SELECT NAME FROM cllease__Termination_Quote_Header__c where Id ='"+res[i]+"'");
            tq= termQuoteResult.getArray("records"); 
            if(tq && tq.length > 0 )
            Termnames = tq[0].Name; 
            //alert(res[i]+' , Agr: '+Agrnames);
        }
        else
        {
            //contractResult = null;
            //cont = null;
            contractResult = sforce.connection.query("SELECT NAME FROM cllease__Termination_Quote_Header__c where Id ='"+res[i]+"'");
            tq= contractResult.getArray("records"); 
            if(tq && tq.length > 0 )
            Termnames = Termnames+','+tq[0].Name;
            //alert(res[i]+' , Agr: '+Agrnames);
        }
    }
      if(Termnames !== undefined)
       appRow.SAF_Contra_Termination_Quote_numbers__c = Termnames;
}

loadlazypanels="true"><components><panelset type="standard" uniqueid="sk-tvT-1023"><panels><panel type="left" width="1200px"><components><buttonset uniqueid="sk-ycZ-1867"><buttons><button type="multi" label="Open Internal Document" uniqueid="sk-yca-1876"><actions><action type="showPopup"><popup title="New Popup" width="90%"><components><template multiple="true" uniqueid="sk-yci-1975" allowhtml="true"><contents><b>Proposal BQI and 3 areas of measurement</b><br><br>
1.	Proposal Check List <b>(Minimum top 3 must have been received before submitting to underwriting)</b><br>
<br>a)	Proposal form
<br>b)	3 months’ bank statements or open banking
<br>c)	Write up. 
<br>d)	Accounts
<br>e)	MI
<br><br>

2.	Reasons for tally on Brokers failed proposal <b>(i.e not submitted to UW at all but tally to be recorded via the Launchpad by broker support)</b><br>
<br>a)	Asset out of appetite  
<br>b)	No credit appetite 
<br>c)	Below minimum lend
<br>d)	Regulated 
<br><br>

3.	Grading 1-5 by broker support <b>(Broker Grade on Proposal Checklist)</b><br>

<br>
<b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b> <br>
<br>1.	Only Proposal form initially sent in with minimal information on the business, asset, and supplier.  
<br>2.	Proposal sent with 3 months UTD bank statements only. 
<br><br>3.	Proposal sent with sufficient information, 3 months UTD bank statements, accounts. 
<br>4.	Proposal sent with sufficient information 3 months UTD bank details, accounts, write up and rationale. 
<br>5.	Proposal sent in with comprehensive information, 3 or more months bank statements, MI, comprehensive write up and rationale along with full asset details. 

<br><br>
<b>S&HP back</b><br>
<br>1.	Only Proposal form initially sent in with minimal information on the business, asset. 
<br>2.	Proposal sent with 3 months UTD bank statements only. 
<br>3.	Proposal sent with sufficient information, 3 months UTD bank statements, accounts, full information on asset to obtain valuation. 
<br>4.	Proposal sent with sufficient information 3 months UTD bank details, accounts, write up and rationale, full information on asset to obtain valuation. 
<br>5.	Proposal sent in with comprehensive information, 3 or more months bank statements, MI, comprehensive write up and rationale along with full asset details to obtain valuation along with photos.
